DataElement.preferredDefinition: Consumption of medicine, drugs, or other materials including prescription, over-the-counter, or street drugs; alcohol; and tobacco._The desire to experience the effect(s) of a previously used psycho-active substance. It has to be noted that not all drug craving is based on withdrawal, since craving can often occur in the absence of withdrawal._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
